entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Enum should implement IBitwiseOperators, IEqualityOperators #81664
  • Anonymous pipe Dispose() hangs on Linux when a pending synchronous write is blocked #81663
  • Creating tar file from a directory owned by an unknown group throws an exception on Linux #81658
  • Add support for converting structs into custom marshallers structs in Visual Studio #81656
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.NETCore.App.deps.json is missing a runtime section for the fallback rid on non-portable builds #81654

Closed

  • Channels can easily have unobserved exceptions #80885
    Future
  • [LSG] LoggerMessage - Add diagnostic - Can't have malformed format strings #52226
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat failing with RegexMatchTimeoutException in #81543
  • SPMI: an issue around runtime lookup #81637
    8.0.0
  • Trying to verify HttpClient.GetStreamAsync return type #81659
  • Q: Safety of heterogeneous arrays #81655
  • packages.microsoft.com apt update is veeerrryy slooow (1-2 sec per source) #81645

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix spmi jit flag dumper for new flag #81667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
  • Fix EncodingExtensions.Convert for sliced single segment ROSequence #81665
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • LSG: removing unnecessary null forgiven operators and refactor other minor nullability issues #81662
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Display TP diffs as a range in the header #81661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve performance of ConfigurationBinder (#81183) #81660
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Optimize IND<SIMD>(RVA) #81651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Suppress unobserved task exceptions for channel Completion tasks #81652
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize Guid.ToString #81650
    area-System.Runtime
  • SPMI: Fix SpmiRecordsHelper::RestoreCORINFO_RUNTIME_LOOKUP #81657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't clone a large tree in impRuntimeLookupToTree #81472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Adjust impNormStructVal to not wrap in GT_OBJ #81636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2105270 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Jiterpreter] Add support for TryGetHashCode intrinsic #81644
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-05

Issues

Updated

  • PackageValidation should warn if documentation files are dropped (.xml) #19614

  • API Compat implements functionality for checking internal API but does not expose it #28712
    8.0.1xx
  • APICompat resources are not shipping in the SDK - missing localization #29598
    8.0.1xx
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249

PullRequests

Merged

  • Delete regex timeout #30347

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • CSharpSyntaxWalker does not invoke VisitTrivia #66713

Updated

  • Visual Studio 2022 makes double quote escaped when pasting copied text #66441
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server fails to upgrade to .net7 (Invocation provides 4 argument(s) but target expects 0) #46471
  • Perf regression: single_query #46470
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #46469
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #46468
  • IdentityFramework: VerifyUserTokenAsync() failed with purpose: "ResetPassword" for user. #46467
  • [AOT] Clean up gRPC template #46465
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Generating new 2FA recovery codes fail when EFCore has QueryTrackingBehavior.NoTracking set globally #46464
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #46463
  • Update `<ValidationSummary />` to add `CssClass` and pass additional attributes to the generated DOM element #46461

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #46421
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #46459
  • GrpcTemplate is quarantined #41716
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Add aot option to gRPC template #46462
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2105196 #46458
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Unquarantined GrpcTemplate #46452
    area-mvc, area-grpc, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update gRPC template dependencies for AOT #46447
    area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published Android App crashes due to XAML incompatibility #13124
  • [iOS] Map pin InfoWindowClicked event is never fired #13123
  • BoolToObjectConverter doesn't work with IconTintColorBehavior In Android #13122
  • Camera MediaPicker throws error about write external storage on api 31 #13119

Closed

  • How to downgrade maui sdk from 7.0.58 to 7.0.52 #12998
  • App exits immediately #13121

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Proposal] Organize partial classes inside Controls #13113
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
